content.html: Yay. HUGE client has signed the contract. BIG WIN! Now it's revealed they're anti abortion, anti trans and all sorts of other stuff. I've told them we're walking. Good money to promote your vile agenda? No thanks.
content.value:
Yay. HUGE client has signed the contract. BIG WIN!

Now it's revealed they're anti abortion, anti trans and all sorts of other stuff. 

I've told them we're walking.

Good money to promote your vile agenda?  No thanks.
